desc: Eighth Order is a veteran-owned company dedicated to telling veteran stories through the lens of their combat uniforms. Like a fingerprint, every veteran and their story is unique. What remains constant and is similar to all of them is the effects of combat on the fighting men and women behind the uniform.

layout.text:
Up-cycled Into New Products
Designed To CARRY FORWARD
Warrior Stories

Hand Crafted In Chicago
Proceeds Benefit Veteran Physical
& Mental Health Programs
